shared

Types

ClapEventFlag {.size: 4.} = enum
  ceIS_LIVE, ceDONT_RECORD
ClapEventFlags = distinct uint32
ClapEventHeader = object
  size*: uint32
  time*: uint32
  space_id*: uint16
  event_type*: ClapEventType
  flags*: ClapEventFlags

ClapEventMidi = object
  header*: ClapEventHeader
  port_index*: uint16
  data*: array[3, uint8]

ClapEventMidi2 = object
  header*: ClapEventHeader
  port_index*: uint16
  data*: array[4, uint32]

ClapEventMidiSysex = object
  header*: ClapEventHeader
  port_index*: uint16
  buffer*: ptr UncheckedArray[uint8]
  size*: uint32

ClapEventNote = object
  header*: ClapEventHeader
  note_id*: int32
  port_index*: int16
  channel*: int16
  key*: int16
  velocity*: float64

ClapEventNoteExpression = object
  header*: ClapEventHeader
  note_id*: int32
  port_index*: int16
  channel*: int16
  key*: int16
  value*: float64

ClapEventParamGesture = object
  header*: ClapEventHeader
  param_id*: ClapID

ClapEventParamMod = ClapEventParamValue
ClapEventParamValue = object
  header*: ClapEventHeader
  param_id*: ClapID
  cookie*: pointer
  note_id*: int32
  port_index*: int16
  channel*: int16
  key*: int16
  val_amt*: float64

ClapEventType {.size: 2.} = enum
  cetNOTE_ON = 0, cetNOTE_OFF = 1, cetNOTE_CHOKE = 2, cetNOTE_END = 3,
  cetNOTE_EXPRESSION = 4, cetPARAM_VALUE = 5, cetPARAM_MOD = 6,
  cetPARAM_GESTURE_BEGIN = 7, cetPARAM_GESTURE_END = 8, cetTRANSPORT = 9,
  cetMIDI = 10, cetMIDI_SYSEX = 11, cetMIDI2 = 12
ClapEventUnion {.union.} = object
  kindNote*: ClapEventNote
  kindNoteExpr*: ClapEventNoteExpression
  kindParamValMod*: ClapEventParamValue
  kindParamGesture*: ClapEventParamGesture
  kindMidi*: ClapEventMidi
  kindMidiSysex*: ClapEventMidiSysex
  kindMidi2*: ClapEventMidi2

ClapInputEvents = object
  ctx*: pointer
  size*: proc (list: ptr ClapInputEvents): uint32 {.cdecl.}
  get*: proc (list: ptr ClapInputEvents; index: uint32): ptr ClapEventUnion {.
      cdecl.}

ClapNoteExpression = distinct int32
ClapNoteExpressionType {.size: 4.} = enum
  cneVOLUME = 0, cnePAN = 1, cneTUNING = 2, cneVIBRATO = 3, cneEXPRESSION = 4,
  cneBRIGHTNESS = 5, cnePRESSURE = 6
ClapOutputEvents = object
  ctx*: pointer
  try_push*: proc (list: ptr ClapOutputEvents; event: ptr ClapEventUnion): bool {.
      cdecl.}
